title: Money or RP refund
body:
I would like a refund on my RP purchase.I planed today to buy myself 1 Hextech key and when I went on my phone to send the key word "KUPI" which means "BUY" on English and I wrote "KYPI" by mistake.I didnt expect for it to take my money so when I tried to send message again it didnt work.And when I checked my phone money account my money was missing.My purchase was 140 RP one.

My Summoners name is : Lolzila123

P.S. I copied same text from old post because the old one was deleted because it was in bad section.Please give me refund,money doesnt grow on trees. :/

replies.body: Given the unique situation with your billing method, make sure to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!  One of our Billing Specialists should be able to help you out and get this sorted!
